title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build real-world projects and become a full-stack developer.

title: Python for Data Science
description: Learn Python programming, data analysis with Pandas, visualization with Matplotlib, and machine learning basics.

title: UI/UX Design Masterclass
description: Design beautiful user interfaces and create amazing user experiences using Figma, Adobe XD, and design principles.

title: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Build cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native and JavaScript.

title: Digital Marketing Complete Course
description: Master SEO, social media marketing, email marketing, content marketing, and Google Analytics.

title: Advanced JavaScript & TypeScript
description: Deep dive into JavaScript ES6+, TypeScript, async programming, design patterns, and advanced concepts.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS
description: Learn Amazon Web Services, EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, and deploy scalable cloud applications.

title: Graphic Design Fundamentals
description: Master Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign. Create stunning graphics, logos, and brand identities.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Learn network security, ethical hacking, penetration testing, and protect systems from cyber threats.

title: Business Analytics & Excel
description: Master Excel, data visualization, pivot tables, VBA macros, and business intelligence tools.

title: Machine Learning & AI
description: Explore machine learning algorithms, neural networks, deep learning with TensorFlow and PyTorch.

title: Video Editing with Premiere Pro
description: Create professional videos, learn color grading, audio editing, effects, and storytelling techniques.
